sections.heading: Encumbrances; duty of referee; notice of hearing
sections.text: The referee shall give the parties interested at least five days' notice of the time and place when he will receive proof of the amount of such encumbrances.SourceR.S.1867, Code ยง 821, p. 540;R.S.1913, ยง 8304;C.S.1922, ยง 9256;C.S.1929, ยง 20-2188;R.S.1
